name: Meow Script
description: Meow Script is a monoline font with a number of alternate forms in six stylistic sets. It works eclectically and harmoniously to add a fun, whimsy look to your posters, ads, invitations and similar designs. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/meow-script .
author: Robert Leuschke
